content: We can switch to the LSP inlay hints in https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/pull/11935 (thus requiring Code 1.66 for inlay hints). @David Barsky would that be problem for you? I'm not sure which Code version you're currently on.
Flatpak updated vscode to 1.66 a couple of days ago, so I'm personally fine with it.
we’re on 1.58 internally and hope to be on 1.63 in may. we currently have our own LSP client and don’t use rust-analyzer’s. we also don’t have any inlay hints, so don’t worry about cutting us off
(plus, until i setup regular funding/sponsorship of y’all, i can’t ask y’all to hold off on updating, and even then, i’d rather work on graceful fallbacks to older versions.)
